title: Environmental Chemist
summary: Environmental chemists address pollution control, design clean-up processes, serve as emergency advisors, and create more sustainable products and processes. Environmental chemists require a background in chemistry as well as knowledge of biology, ecology, and other scientific fields. Chemists work in a variety of industries, including chemical, government, and waste management.

title: How Tata Steel is leading sustainability in the steel sector
summary: Tata Steel, India's oldest steelmaker, is a leader in sustainability, with a focus on reducing carbon footprint, water consumption, and solid waste. The company has implemented various initiatives such as recycling steel scrap, using renewable energy, and developing eco-friendly products to minimize its environmental impact. Tata Steel's efforts have been recognized by worldsteel as a Steel Sustainability Champion for seven consecutive years.
green_innovation: TRUE, Tata Steel's initiatives in recycling steel scrap, using renewable energy, and developing eco-friendly products contribute to environmental sustainability goals such as reducing carbon emissions and conserving natural resources.
business_innovation: TRUE, Tata Steel's Electric Arc Furnace (EAF) based long products steel plant in Ludhiana is a new or improved business process that differs significantly from the firm's previous business processes and has been brought into use in the firm.
green_product: TRUE, Tata Steel's eco-friendly light construction products such as green paver blocks and interlocking blocks, which are manufactured using iron and steel slags, meet the criteria to be a green product.
green_process: TRUE, Tata Steel's conversion of hazardous sludge of steel plant into value-added pellets, replacement of coal tar usage in blast furnace by low-sulphur furnace oil, and development of a patented sustainable waste management technology for utilizing Basic Oxygen Furnace slag to manufacture a sulphur-rich nutrient supplement are examples of green processes.
product_or_process: Electric Arc Furnace (EAF) based long products steel plant, eco-friendly light construction products, conversion of hazardous sludge of steel plant into value-added pellets, replacement of coal tar usage in blast furnace by low-sulphur furnace oil, and development of a patented sustainable waste management technology for utilizing Basic Oxygen Furnace slag to manufacture a sulphur-rich nutrient supplement.
likely_naics_codes: ['331111 Iron and Steel Mills', '332111 Iron and Steel Forging', '332112 Steel Wiredrawing', '332114 Cold-Rolled Steel Shape Manufacturing']
greenwashing: The article does not provide evidence of greenwashing.

title: Nanocatalysts Global Strategic Research Report 2023-2024 & 2030 - Expanding Role of Renewable Fuels in the Global Energy Mix Reflects Opportunities - ResearchAndMarkets.com
summary: The global nanocatalysts market is projected to grow from US$2.5 Billion in 2023 to US$4.1 Billion by 2030, driven by increasing demand for clean energy, environmental protection, and chemical manufacturing. Nanocatalysts are playing a crucial role in improving the efficiency of chemical reactions, reducing energy consumption, and minimizing environmental impact.

title: Farmers concerned about ‘forever chemicals’ found in wastewater sludge
summary: Sewage sludge spread on farmland can contaminate the land with PFAS, which are harmful to human health. Several farmers in the United States have had to shut down their operations due to PFAS contamination. The Maine legislature has banned the application of sewage sludge on land, and other states are considering similar bans.

title: Top 50 Socially Responsible Companies 2013
summary: This article highlights 50 Canadian companies that prioritize corporate social responsibility through their commitment to environmental sustainability, social justice, and responsible business practices. Their efforts include initiatives to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, promote social equity, and implement sustainable business practices throughout their operations.
